main.java.model

Interface IMainViewModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainViewModelAmazon, MainViewModelMicrosoft

    public interface IMainViewModel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addFace(java.lang.String imagePath, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String userData)
      Create a new person by adding a representative face, a name and if desired some data to a person for identification.
      java.util.List<IPerson> detectFaces(java.lang.String imagePath)
      Detect human faces in an image and create a table of persons (with informations like the id, gender, smile, ...) based on those faces.
      java.util.List<IPerson> identifyFaces(java.lang.String imagePath)
      Identify unknown faces from a person group.

    • Method Detail

      • detectFaces

        java.util.List<IPerson> detectFaces(java.lang.String imagePath)
        Detect human faces in an image and create a table of persons (with informations like the id, gender, smile, ...) based on those faces.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - - The path of the image to detect
        Returns:
        A successful call returns a list of persons ranked by face rectangle size in descending order. An empty response indicates no faces detected.

      • identifyFaces

        java.util.List<IPerson> identifyFaces(java.lang.String imagePath)
        Identify unknown faces from a person group. PRE : The "detectFaces" method has do be called before calling this one.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - - The path of the image to identify
        Returns:
        A successful call returns a list of known persons identified. An empty response indicates no known faces.

      • addFace

        boolean addFace(java.lang.String imagePath,
                java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String userData)
        Create a new person by adding a representative face, a name and if desired some data to a person for identification.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - - The path of the image which represents the person's face.
        name - - The name of the person
        userData - - Some data about the user (optionnal)
        Returns:
        true if everything went good
